questions.text: Complete this HTML to create a hyperlink to Google: ```html Google ```

```html

questions.text:
Complete this HTML to create a button:
```html
<button>Click me</button>
```
questions.correct_answer: A clickable button with text 'Click me'
questions.explanation: The <button> tag creates a clickable button.

questions.text:

Content

questions.text:
Complete this HTML to create an ordered list: ```html
  1. First
  2. Second
```
questions.correct_answer: A numbered list with First and Second
questions.explanation: The <ol> tag creates an ordered (numbered) list.

questions.text: What is the output of this HTML when rendered? ```html Inline text ```
questions.explanation: The <span> tag is an inline container for text.

questions.text:

```html

    <input type="text">
</form>
```
questions.explanation: The opening <form> tag is missing a closing >.

Complete this HTML to add a meta description:
```html

```

questions.explanation: The meta description provides a summary for search engines.

```html

questions.text:
Complete this HTML to link a stylesheet:
```html
<link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css">
```
questions.correct_answer: Links a CSS file named styles.css
questions.explanation: The <link> tag connects an external stylesheet.
